title: Update block.max_gas to 60M for Anchor Lane
summary:
This proposal sets the consensus block.max_gas to 60,000,000 (60M) to enforce the anchor lane capacity limit.

Rationale:
- 60M block gas is calculated for ~100 TPS at 4-second blocks (100 × 4 × 150k avg gas)
- Combined with max_tx_gas=2M, ensures ~30+ transactions needed to fill a block
- Prevents single-tx dominance and protects validator resources
- Leaves 67% headroom for burst absorption at 33% target utilization
- Enforces protocol-level capacity constraints for anchor lane

The current value of -1 (unlimited) provides no protection against block bloat attacks.
metadata: Anchor Lane Block Gas Limit: unlimited -> 60M
